name: MyGodMode

screenshots.caption: Windows GodMode: all tasks, details view
Windows GodMode: all tasks, list view

short_description:
Utility for accessing all Windows' system management functions and customization options from a single place.

MyGodMode integrates with desktop, start menu, quick start toolbar and context menu, and is compatible with Windows Vista, 7, and 8/8.1 systems, 32 and 64 bit.

The GodMode folder, also known as "All tasks", allows all system management tools, usually spread in various places (control panel, computer management, administration tools etc) to be conveniently accessed from a single place, searchable, and it was originally intended to be available only to Microsoft developers.
summary: All Windows' system management functions in a single place
